name: Co-Existence
description:
Co-Existence is a 2-player co-op action game. It is a 2d top down shooter. Two players see the world through different existences. They are in the same environment, but their views are different. One of them sees the world as a medieval setting while the other is in a zombie apocalypse.

The game is playable through LAN. Local co-op is not available. 

Developed in 2 days in participation of BUG Spring 2018 Jam.

Known Bugs:

- Sometimes enemies do not synchronize with the players. It can be fixed with a restart.

Credits:
Programmer, Designer - Şevket Selim Atasoy

2D Artist, Designer - Ömer Said Çağdır
